mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.vehicle_code, v.vehicle_pn, v.vehicle_brand, v.vehicle_made_in, v.mfrs_id, v.vehicle_status, v.create_user, v.create_time, v.update_user, v.update_time FROM `biz_vehicle` v LEFT JOIN biz_ref_org_vehicle r on r.vehicle_id = v.id LEFT JOIN biz_organization o on o.id = r.org_id WHERE r.org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.unbind_time IS NULL
